meanings.sent1: The mysterious package had an unnamed sender.
meanings.sent2: The unnamed hero saved the day without seeking recognition.
meanings.sent3: The unnamed cat sneaked into the house and stole a sock.
meanings.sent4: The unnamed mountain loomed in the distance, shrouded in mist.
meanings.sent5: The unnamed flower bloomed in the garden, its beauty unnoticed by many.

meanings.definition: Not having a name or title
meanings.sent1: The artist displayed an unnamed painting at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The unnamed book on the shelf caught my attention.
meanings.sent3: The unnamed student won the spelling bee with invisible words.
meanings.sent4: The unnamed star twinkled brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The unnamed street led to a hidden garden, full of secrets.

meanings.sent1: The unnamed street remained unmarked on the map.
meanings.sent2: The unnamed character in the story added an air of mystery.
meanings.sent3: The unnamed ingredient in the recipe gave it a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: The unnamed ship sailed silently through the fog.
meanings.sent5: The unnamed island appeared on the horizon, beckoning the adventurous.
